Name: Koukaki
Description: A vibrant residential area known for its proximity to the Acropolis and its lively cafes, bars, and cultural spaces.

Name: Neos Kosmos
Description: A residential neighborhood popular with young professionals, offering easy access to the city center and the beautiful Filopappou Hill.

Name: Pangrati
Description: A charming residential area with a mix of old and modern buildings, featuring parks, museums, and a vibrant local community.

Name: Kallimarmaro
Description: A neighborhood known for the Panathenaic Stadium (Kallimarmaro), the site of the first modern Olympic Games, and its surrounding green spaces.

Name: Exarchia
Description: A historical and alternative neighborhood with a strong intellectual and political presence, filled with street art, cafes, and cultural venues.
